original_text: Tell the older men to control themselves properly. They must think carefully about how they live, so that people respect them. They must continue to believe in Christ. They must continue to love other people. They must continue to be patient and strong.
korean_text: 늙은 남자로는 절제하며 경건하며 신중하며 믿음과 사랑과 인내함에 온전하게 하고

sentences.original_text: Tell the older men to control themselves properly.
sentences.korean_translation: 나이 많은 남자들이 자신을 올바르게 통제하도록 말하라.

sentences.original_text: They must think carefully about how they live,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 어떻게 사는지 신중하게 생각해야 하고,
그래서 사람들이 그들을 존경하게 해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: They must continue to believe in Christ.
They must continue to love other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 사람들을 계속 사랑해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: They must continue to be patient and strong.
